## Doctoral

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
st <- read_csv("students.csv")
st_tbl <- st |>
  mutate(name = paste0("[", student, "](", currently, ")"))
kable(st_tbl[, c(4,2)]) 
```
